feed.title: Lab Dash Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Torrent Client Widget (qBittorrent and Deluge)
  • New Pi-hole Widget (v5 only)
  • Search weather by location instead of by IP (via edit menu)
  • Fix Scrollbar layout shift
  • Allow editing blank items on the dashboard
  • Show current version changelog when clicking the version number in the menu
  • Allow setting the temperature unit for system monitor widget (via edit menu)
  • Various bugfixes and housekeeping

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update Pi-hole widget for v6 api
  • dont use browser location as weather fallback, only use the configured location

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix skewed hover on menu icon
  • slight space from pihole name and logo
  • slight space from top of location in weather widget
  • hide pihole disable dropdown when editing dashboard, opaque menu bg, pihole name spacing
  • Add display name for pi hole widget, prevent multiple calls to pihole api if any errors occur, add retry button to torrent client

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix placeholder row size on small screens
  • Update LICENSE

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix spacing in edit mode on ipad mini/air sized screens
  • ui fixes for ipad mini size screens, fix update notification icon
